articles.description: Former England captain Wayne Rooney says it was "very unfair" of NFL great Tom Brady to question his work ethic as manager at Birmingham City.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney 'really disappointed' by 'very unfair' Tom Brady comments

articles.description: Where will your club finish this season? Phil McNulty makes his predictions for every Premier League team.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Phil McNulty on who will finish where in 2024-25?

articles.description: Reaction to the Super Cup as Paris Saint-Germain beat Tottenham on penalties in Italy.
articles.title: 'Spurs deserved to win' - Super Cup reaction as PSG come back to beat Tottenham

articles.description: Liverpool are closing in on the signing of 18-year-old defender Giovanni Leoni from Parma for a fee of about £26m.
articles.title: Liverpool closing in on deal for Parma defender Giovanni Leoni

articles.description: We ask 32 BBC Sport football pundits to predict who will win the Premier League title, and which clubs will finish in the top four this season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions 2025-26: BBC Sport pundits pick their top four

articles.description: The new football season is here and you will be able to follow all the action across the BBC.
articles.title: A bold new era of football on BBC Sport: Your game, your season

articles.description: England batter Joe Root says David Warner's pre-Ashes sledge is "all part of the fun" and believes he is better placed than ever to score his first century in Australia.
articles.title: Joe Root says David Warner sledge 'all part of the fun' of Ashes build-up

articles.description: Tottenham say they are "disgusted" by the racial abuse received by Mathys Tel following their defeat by Paris St-Germain in the Uefa Super Cup.
articles.title: Mathys Tel: Tottenham 'disgusted' by racist abuse of forward after Uefa Super Cup defeat

articles.description: Tottenham were left feeling low after the Super Cup slipped from their grasp against Paris St-Germain - but there are still reasons for new head coach Thomas Frank to be upbeat.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: Work to do after Super Cup collapse - but promising signs for Thomas Frank

articles.description: Alexander Isak remains determined to leave Newcastle United to join Liverpool but Eddie Howe hopes to "use any adversity or challenge to our benefit".
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United staying together before Premier League kick-off
